columnChooserButtonApplyClick.description:
event fired when button Apply in column chooser is clicked
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.
   Use ui.columnsToShow to get array of columns identifiers which should be shown
   Use ui.columnsToHide to get array of columns identifiers which should be hidden

columnChooserButtonResetClick.description:
event fired when button Reset in column chooser is clicked
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserClosed.description:
event fired after the column chooser has been closed.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserClosing.description:
event fired before the column chooser is closed.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserContentsRendered.description:
event fired after the contents of the column chooser are rendered.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserContentsRendering.description:
event fired before the contents of the column chooser are rendered.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserMoving.description:
event fired every time the column chooser changes its position.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.
   Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the column chooser div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.
   Use ui.position to get the current position of the column chooser div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

columnChooserOpened.description:
event fired after the column chooser is already opened.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnChooserOpening.description:
event fired before the column chooser is opened.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object.

columnHidden.description:
event fired after the hiding has been executed and results are rendered.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnIndex to get the hidden column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number.
   Use ui.columnKey to get the hidden column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

columnHiding.description:
event fired before a hiding operation is executed.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnIndex to get the hidden column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number.
   Use ui.columnKey to get the hidden column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

columnShowing.description:
event fired before a showing operation is executed.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnIndex to get the shown column index.
   Use ui.columnKey to get the shown column key.

columnShown.description:
event fired after the showing has been executed and results are rendered.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnIndex to get the shown column index.
   Use ui.columnKey to get the shown column key.

multiColumnHiding.description:
event fired before a hiding operation is executed.
   The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridHiding widget.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
   Use ui.columnKeys to get array of the hidden column keys.

columnChooserAnimationDuration.description: Specifies time of milliseconds for animation duration to show/hide modal dialog

columnChooserButtonApplyText.description: Specifies text of button which apply changes in modal dialog

columnChooserButtonCancelText.description: Specifies text of button which cancel changes in modal dialog

columnChooserCaptionText.description: The caption of the column chooser dialog.

columnChooserContainment.description:
Controls containment behavior.
owner The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
window The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area

valueOptions.name: owner
valueOptions.description: The column chooser dialog will be draggable only in the grid area

valueOptions.name: window
valueOptions.description: The column chooser dialog will be draggable in the whole window area

columnChooserDisplayText.description: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to launch the column chooser dialog.

columnChooserHeight.description: The default column chooser height in pixels.

columnChooserHideOnClick.description: Specifies on click show/hide directly to be shown/hidden columns. If columnChooserHideOnClick is false then Apply and Cancel Buttons are shown on the bottom of modal dialog. Columns are Shown/Hidden after the Apply button is clicked

columnChooserHideText.description: The text used in the column chooser to hide column

columnChooserShowText.description: The text used in the column chooser to show column

columnChooserWidth.description: The default column chooser width in pixels.

columnHideText.description: The text used in the drop down tools menu(Feature Chooser) to hide a column.

columnSettings.description: A list of column settings that specifies hiding options on a per column basis.

columnKey.description: Specifies the column key of the hidden column

columnIndex.description: Column index can be used in place of column key. The preferred way of populating a column setting is to always use the column keys as identifiers.

allowHiding.description: Allows the column to be hidden.

hidden.description: Sets the initial visibility of the column.

dropDownAnimationDuration.description: The duration of the dropdown animation in milliseconds.

hiddenColumnIndicatorHeaderWidth.description: The width in pixels of the hidden column indicator in the header.

hiddenColumnIndicatorTooltipText.description: The text displayed in the tooltip of the hidden column indicator.
